member.name: PropertyType
member.summary: Identifies the type that is stored in a Windows Runtime object that implements the interface.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Empty
member.summary: The object does not contain a value.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt8
member.summary: The object contains an unsigned 8-bit integer.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Int16
member.summary: The object contains a signed 16-bit integer.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt16
member.summary: The object contains an unsigned 16-bit integer.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Int32
member.summary: The object contains a signed 32-bit integer.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt32
member.summary: The object contains an unsigned 32-bit integer.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Int64
member.summary: The object contains a signed 64-bit integer.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt64
member.summary: The object contains an unsigned 64-bit integer.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Single
member.summary: The object contains a 32-bit floating point value. This value conforms to the IEEE 754 standard.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Double
member.summary: The object contains a 64-bit floating point value. This value conforms to the IEEE 754 standard.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Char16
member.summary: The object contains a 16-bit character. This character represents a UTF-16 (Unicode) code unit.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Boolean
member.summary: The object contains an 8-bit Boolean value.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_String
member.summary: The object contains an HSTRING.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Inspectable
member.summary: The object contains an object that implements the interface.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Guid
member.summary: The object contains a GUID.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Size
member.summary: The object contains a .

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Rect
member.summary: The object contains a .

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_OtherType
member.summary: The object contains an unspecified type.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt8Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of unsigned 8-bit integers.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Int16Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of signed 16-bit integers.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt16Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of unsigned 16-bit integers.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Int32Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of signed 32-bit integers.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt32Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of unsigned 32-bit integers.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Int64Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of signed 64-bit integers.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_UInt64Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of unsigned 64-bit integers.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_SingleArray
member.summary: The object contains an array of 32-bit floating point values.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_DoubleArray
member.summary: The object contains an array of 64-bit floating point values.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_Char16Array
member.summary: The object contains an array of 16-bit characters.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_BooleanArray
member.summary: The object contains an array of 8-bit Boolean values.

member.name: PropertyType.PropertyType_StringArray
member.summary: The object contains an array of HSTRING.

member.summary: The object contains an array of objects that implement the interface.
